pps.start:
Starts a rock paper scissors game against AI
Rock beats scissors, paper beats rock and scissors beat paper.
Press button A for selecting a hand.
Press button B for accepting a selected hand.
pps.startRadio:
Starts a rock paper scissors game against another micro:bit
Rock beats scissors, paper beats rock and scissors beat paper.
Press button A for selecting a hand.
Press button B for accepting a selected hand.
pps.showHand: Shows the icon of a hand, wich can be a rock, a paper or scissors
